document_data.name: Cummberbund
document_data.mainbody: '''Cummerbunds''' were a form of broad, fitted [[belt]] found in the Realms.
document_data.Availability:
* [[Borgil's Bold Buckles]] in the village of [[Blisterfoot Inn]] sold elaborate, curlicued metal cummerbunds with raised ornamental compartments for concealing coin purses or [[knives]].
* [[Chalasse's Fine Clothing]] in [[Immersea]] sold luxury cummerbunds.
document_data.History: In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], cummerbunds were a quite common accessory in parts of [[Cormyr]] and in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Notable Wearers:
* The [[avatar]] of [[Oghma]] typically wore a cummerbund with a [[medallion]]-shaped [[buckle]] that had an exquisitely beautiful scene painted on it.<ref>
* The statuette [[Silver Supplicant]] was adorned in what looked to be a cummerbund of [[spider silk]].<ref>
* [[Simbul]].<ref>
* [[Storm Silverhand]] wore a black cummerbund.<ref>
* [[Xara Tantlor]] wore a cummerbund.<ref>
